idea-plugin.name: Warp-WebStorm Integration
idea-plugin.description:
AI-coordinated integration between JetBrains IDEs and Warp terminal

This plugin enables seamless multi-agent workflows that coordinate code editing, testing, debugging, and deployment operations between your JetBrains IDE and Warp terminal.

Key Features:

  • Real-time Context Sync: Automatically share project context between IDE and terminal
  • AI Agent Coordination: Multi-agent workflows for complex development tasks
  • Smart Command Integration: Execute terminal commands with IDE context awareness
  • Debug Session Sync: Coordinate debugging between IDE and terminal
  • Git Workflow Integration: Synchronized version control operations

Requirements:

  • Warp Terminal installed and running
  • Node.js 18+ for MCP server
  • Network connectivity for local MCP communication
